i wonder if spaniards eat pizza on drunken late-nights like americans do.  it seemed that way on sat night, b/c the joint was packed.  this place is like the golden boy (sf pizza place in north beach) of barcelona.  go to the counter, pick the slices you want (they have a ton of variety), and they will heat them up for you.  if you're a veg, there are a lot of options here for you.
